body:
IINM the shebang is interpreted by the shell, so I'd say this is WAI. Perhaps try something like (not tested):

`cmd := exec.Command("sh", "-c", fmt.Sprintf("screen.js %s %s %s %s", arg1, arg2, arg3, arg4))`

or

`cmd := exec.Command([]string{"sh", "-c", "screen.js", arg1, arg2, arg3, arg4}...)`
